name: immutable-linked-ordered-map
description: A JavaScript immutable linked ordered map.

scripts.publish-git: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run dev-build
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build-all && npm version patch && npm run publish-git
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build-all && npm version minor && npm run publish-git
scripts.publish-major: npm run build-all && npm version major && npm run publish-git

author: Anton Bagdatyev (Tonix)
